PENDING.constant: 0   # The goal has yet to be processed by the action server

ACTIVE.constant: 1   # The goal is currently being processed by the action server

PREEMPTED.constant: 2   # The goal received a cancel request after it started executing

comment: sent over the wire by an action server

SUCCEEDED.constant: 3   # The goal was achieved successfully by the action server (Terminal State)

ABORTED.constant: 4   # The goal was aborted during execution by the action server due

REJECTED.constant: 5   # The goal was rejected by the action server without being processed,

PREEMPTING.constant: 6   # The goal received a cancel request after it started executing

RECALLING.constant: 7   # The goal received a cancel request before it started executing,

RECALLED.constant: 8   # The goal received a cancel request before it started executing

LOST.constant: 9   # An action client can determine that a goal is LOST. This should not be
